attributes.action: Unsolicited nude pictures to be considered as Indecent Exposure
attributes.additional_details: The law needs updating to include online sexual offences of unsolicited explicit pictures. When people intentionally expose their genitals with no given consent, it is very distressing and upsetting. The law needs updated to include this regular online offence.
attributes.background: To make unsolicited nudes pictures illegal by being considered as Indecent Exposure under the Sexual Offences Act 203.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550125
